body_html:
I'm following up here in case it's useful to others. (I was in touch with someone from NVidia about this).
This does seem to be a driver bug, one that happens only occasionally with no clear pattern. There doesn't seem to be workaround other than just trying again.

body:
I'm following up here in case it's useful to others.  (I was in touch with someone from NVidia about this). 
This does seem to be a driver bug, one that happens only occasionally with no clear pattern.  There doesn't seem to be workaround other than just trying again.
